group_1.narration: Meiyui's father and grandfather both@belong to the Blue Seas Family.
But soon after her birth, Meiyui's father @took the family to Hong Kong to help out @a relative's business.
After several years in Hong Kong, Meiyui @returned alone to Kamihama 4 years ago.
Her father, who always supported the@Blue Seas, was happy when Meiyui@wanted to train on the Family's home turf.

group_1.textRight: Meiyui, thank you for @carrying my bags for me.

group_1.textLeft: I just wanted to make sure you were okay. @Traffic is heavy in this intersection.
How can I thank you enough!  Hanging up @posters for the festival is so much work...

group_1.textRight: It's nothing at all. @I was on my way home from school anyway.

group_1.narration: Meiyui spent day after day engaged in this@kind of charity work.
She was happy. She would say, "This@is how the Blue Seas Family should be."
But one day, a member of the Blue Seas@Family told her a disturbing story...

group_1.textLeft: Land sharking?@Why would a shark be on land?

group_1.textRight: There're people who try to buy@up land...in a forceful manner.
The local shopping districts are@having a rough time because of them.

group_1.textLeft: So they came to us and@asked us to sort things out.

group_1.textRight: We might have to get rough for the first time@in a long while...

group_1.textLeft: First we need to consult with the Elder.
...But, we will help them, of course.

group_1.narration: Meiyui spoke to the leader of the @Family and got permission to act.
She wanted to protect the town, which was @once the Blue Seas Family's territory...

group_1.textLeft: The first step is to know the enemy, right?@To do that...
You must first talk to them. If that@settles the problem, that's good, right?

group_1.textRight: Talk to them, huh? I'm not sure @they'll take us up on our invitation.

group_1.textLeft: They will also want to learn@how we will react to them.
They'll take us up on it,@I'm pretty sure.

group_1.textRight: No, Meiyui. I'll go!@[chara:801100:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json]If anything were to happen to you...
Don't be a fool!@Meiyui is tougher than you are!
She may not look it, but Meiyui@is a true master of kung fu.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, I'm not a master yet!@But I do train hard every day.
Know your enemy, know thyself, and you@shall not fear even one hundred battles.
